noun.description: A slender, iron-tipped, hardwood spear used chiefly by southern African peoples.
A South African tree of the dogwood family, which yields hard timber.

verb.description: Wound or kill with an assegai.
examples: he was a very brave man but he was eventually assegaied

origin: Early 17th century: from obsolete French azagaie or Portuguese azagaia, from Arabic az-zaġāyah, from az, al the + Berber zaġāyah spear.
